pageTitle: Roseanna Anika Floral Maxi Dress | SHOPBOP
textBeforeTable: Model Measurements French sizes. Sizes listed are Size & Fit Length: 48in / 122cm, from shoulder MEASUREMENTS Made in France. Dry clean. 100% silk. Fabric: Silk crepe. Sweet floral graphics provide colorful appeal to an airy Roseanna dress, cut from lightweight silk. Lattice trim frames the waistline, revealing peeks of skin. Pleats offer soft texture, and the exposed back creates a sultry finish. 3/4 sleeves. Unlined. Description Roseanna Dresses > Roseanna Clothing > Day to Night > Dresses > Clothing >
textAfterTable: Because sizing and cut will vary between brands, please use this chart as a general guide. If you are between sizes or need assistance selecting the proper size, please contact Customer Service Designer A blend of the designers’ nicknames, the founding of Roseanna apparel in 2007 fullfilled childhood friends Anne-Fleur Broudehoux and Roxane Thiery’s dream of designing together. Roseanna clothing offers a complete wardrobe with a nonchalant, refined aesthetic, and though the pieces have an improvised air, they are actually quite studied. French fabrication, handcrafted know-how, and quality finishing are essential to the brand, which has been worn by Reese Witherspoon and Jessica Alba. Shipping & Returns Free Shipping Worldwide: No matter where you are sending your order, we offer free express shipping across the globe. Shipping Details Easy Returns: Because we understand that not every purchase is exactly right, we've made returns easy. With the return form and return shipping label included with every order, customer service calls aren't necessary. And if you're in the USA, returns are free. Return Details Shipping Available: Shipping Within USA Only: For Amazon Prime members, free two-day shipping is available for all Shopbop products.
